title: [Ruins, Terrace of Cages]
description: Piles of cages strung with thick ropes border the platform, the rest of its expanse covered in petite huts.  Each hut is just large enough to fit a single bed, and some are adorned with odd bits of sinew, bone, seaweed, or shells.

A pile of cages affixed with thick ropes lines the edges of the platform, the rest of its expanse covered in small huts.  Each small hut is just large enough to fit a single bed, and some are adorned with odd bits of sinew, bone, seaweed, or shells.  The pathway widens as it returns to the central platform of the ruins.
